/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The viewer's perspective is that of a pedestrian standing on the sidewalk, looking down the length of the street. The street itself is flanked on both sides by lush green trees and bushes, their leaves a vibrant green. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it. The image is taken from a low angle, adding a sense of depth and perspective to the scene. The colors in the image are rich and natural, with the green of the trees and bushes contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky. The overall effect is a tranquil and inviting snapshot of everyday life in Beijing.
